original_title: From Kiskeya to Haïti: Where Have Our Trees Gone?
overview: The documentary film From Kiskeya to Haïti: Where Have Our Trees Gone? raises awareness about the challenges related to deforestation in Haiti. The film features archives and interviews that analyze over 300 years of timber harvesting and the effects that it has had on Haiti's environment.
title: From Kiskeya to Haïti: Where Have Our Trees Gone?
